full.extract:
Lucy Allan is a family rights campaigner from the United Kingdom. Following a high profile media campaign, based on her own family's experience, she founded Family First Group, a lobby group which campaigns to reduce the number of children in state care, for improvements to the UK child protection system and support for families affected by it. She was a Councillor
 in the London Borough of Wandsworth from 2006 to 2012. In March 2013, Allan was selected as the Conservative Party parliamentary candidate to contest the constituency of Telford at the 2015 General Election.
